printed_text: +1[mu] You get +1 maximum hand size for each tag you have. The first time each turn a successful run on HQ or R&D ends, draw 1 card for each time you accessed a card during that run. Limit 1 console per player.
stripped_printed_text: +1 mu You get +1 maximum hand size for each tag you have. The first time each turn a successful run on HQ or R&D ends, draw 1 card for each time you accessed a card during that run. Limit 1 console per player.

flavor: "In extremity, your conscience may make you terrible." -Omar Keung, the Flashpoint
printed_text: Whenever you encounter a code gate, you may install this program from your heap. 3[credit]: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the code gate you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you encounter a code gate, you may install this program from your heap. 3 credits: +2 strength. Then, if this program can interface with the code gate you are encountering, break up to 2 subroutines.

printed_text: [click]: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ or R&D for the remainder of that run. Use this ability only once per turn.
stripped_printed_text: click: Run Archives. If that run would be declared successful, change the attacked server to HQ or R&D for the remainder of that run. Use this ability only once per turn.

flavor: Khan's avatar lifted her arm and the bird launched itself into the air.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 3[credit]: +3 strength. 2[credit], add this program to your grip: Derez 1 code gate this program fully broke during this encounter.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 3 credits: +3 strength. 2 credits, add this program to your grip: Derez 1 code gate this program fully broke during this encounter.

flavor: My brain is the key that sets my mind free.
printed_text: Interface → 1[credit]: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2[credit]: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.
stripped_printed_text: Interface -> 1 credit: Break 1 code gate subroutine. 2 credits: +4 strength for the remainder of this run. Use this ability only by spending at least 1 credit from a stealth card.

flavor: "Live, unfiltered, and uncensored: this is Net Mercur, signing off for the night. Stay safe, New Angeles."
printed_text: The first time you spend at least 1[credit] from a stealth card each run, place 1[credit] on Net Mercur or draw 1 card. Use credits on Net Mercur for anything.
stripped_printed_text: The first time you spend at least 1 credit from a stealth card each run, place 1 credit on Net Mercur or draw 1 card. Use credits on Net Mercur for anything.

flavor: All bioroids are bound by the Three Directives, but in theory a bioroid could have any number of core directives. Even zero.
printed_text:
Whenever you draw a card, reveal that card.
The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may look at the top card of R&D.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever you draw a card, reveal that card. The first time each turn you make a successful run, you may look at the top card of R&D.

flavor: "Last week, I crossed the street to avoid her. Today, she pulled me out of the rubble. Makes me rethink who the bad guys are."
printed_text: 2[credit]: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only if you have suffered damage from a Corp card ability this turn.
stripped_printed_text: 2 credits: Draw 1 card. Use this ability only if you have suffered damage from a Corp card ability this turn.

flavor: In battle, I take half the slain.
printed_text: Lose [click][click][click]: Break up to 3 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 3[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] The Runner must pay 3[credit] or trash 1 of their installed cards. [subroutine] Do 1 core damage or end the run.
stripped_printed_text: Lose click click click: Break up to 3 subroutines on this ice. Only the Runner can use this ability. Subroutine The Runner must pay 3 credits or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine The Runner must pay 3 credits or trash 1 of their installed cards. Subroutine Do 1 core damage or end the run.

flavor: "If you live off-site, please consult the building AI for temporary housing. We regret that your off-site family cannot join you here while we are in lockdown..."
printed_text: Name a card. Remove all copies of that card in the heap from the game.
stripped_printed_text: Name a card. Remove all copies of that card in the heap from the game.

flavor: "Wait a minute, I don't even have a cat."
printed_text:
Play only if the Runner trashed a card while accessing it during their last turn.
Trace[2]. If successful, trash 2 installed non-program cards. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner trashed a card while accessing it during their last turn. Trace 2. If successful, trash 2 installed non-program cards. If unsuccessful, take 1 bad publicity.

printed_text: When you score Project Kusanagi, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 2. Hosted agenda counter: Choose 1 piece of ice to gain "[subroutine] Do 1 net damage." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.
stripped_printed_text: When you score Project Kusanagi, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 2. Hosted agenda counter: Choose 1 piece of ice to gain "Subroutine Do 1 net damage." after all its other subroutines for the remainder of this run.

flavor: When your ID is flagged with your genetic profile, "privacy"  doesn't really exist.
printed_text:
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
[subroutine] Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2[credit].
stripped_printed_text: Subroutine Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2 credits. Subroutine Do 1 net damage. The Runner loses 2 credits.

printed_text: Whenever the Runner takes at least 1 net damage, trash the top card of the stack.
stripped_printed_text: Whenever the Runner takes at least 1 net damage, trash the top card of the stack.

flavor: "She used to work for me at my chop shop. Now she makes more money than I do." -MacPherson
printed_text: [trash]: Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. The Runner may pay any number of credits to prevent 1 random card in HQ from being shuffled into R&D for every 2[credit] spent.
stripped_printed_text: trash: Shuffle all cards in HQ into R&D. The Runner may pay any number of credits to prevent 1 random card in HQ from being shuffled into R&D for every 2 credits spent.

flavor: Observing is fun, but it's just the appetizer.
printed_text:
Play only if the Runner has fewer than 6[credit].
As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag.
Trash 1 installed card.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner has fewer than 6 credits. As an additional cost to play this operation, remove 1 tag. Trash 1 installed card.

printed_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to run for the first time during their turn, the Runner must spend 1[credit].
stripped_printed_text: This operation is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. As an additional cost to run for the first time during their turn, the Runner must spend 1 credit.

printed_text:
Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags.
As an additional cost to play this operation, spend [click].
Do 7 meat damage.
stripped_printed_text: Play only if the Runner has at least 2 tags. As an additional cost to play this operation, spend click. Do 7 meat damage.

printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When the Runner's turn begins, Trace[1]. If successful, do 1 meat damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. When the Runner's turn begins, Trace[1]. If successful, do 1 meat damage if the Runner is tagged; otherwise, give the Runner 1 tag.

flavor: The event is now referred to as the Water Tower Massacre. No one was ever indicted, and no one knows who paid the prisec team responsible.
printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The install cost of each resource is increased by 2.
stripped_printed_text: This card is not trashed until another current is played or an agenda is stolen. The install cost of each resource is increased by 2.
